name: GALACTIC FIELD 《银河领域》
description:
This is a brand new space sci-fi flight shooting game. The story of the game takes place in a distant future world, which is about an interstellar war between three different factions. Players can choose the spaceship pilot status of any faction faction to join the interstellar war of these factions. At the same time, players can also control various types of spaceships to fight with the frontline enemies. In addition to advocating fast-paced competitive flight shooting gameplay, the game also provides a variety of personalized modes and gameplay details setting functions. It is especially suitable for live streaming. The host can easily interact with the audience anytime while playing. In addition, the game is non-violent and suitable for players of any age, especially those who like sci-fi warfare and space flight. Right now, the game is a basic version, and more modes will be added in the future. Due to limited resources, there are only single-player and double-player modes. However, you can get free updates. Hope you will like and support this game!
Game Features: Fast-paced, exciting, shooting, sci-fi, space

Reminder - the game has many customizable mode options. It is recommended that players adjust and play in their own favorite mode. The official default mode may not be suitable for every player's preference.
developers: Two Thousand and one entertainment studios
publishers: Two Thousand and one entertainment studios
